metadata.name: File Download From IP Based URL Via CertOC.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects when a user downloads a file from an IP based URL using CertOC.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\certoc.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('certoc.exe') AND process.cmd_line rlike '://\[0-9\]\{1,3\}\\.\[0-9\]\{1,3\}\\.\[0-9\]\{1,3\}\\.\[0-9\]\{1,3\}' AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-getcacaps')))

output.summary: Detects when a user downloads a file from an IP based URL using CertOC.exe
